caption.p: Effect of altitude on the cytotoxic activities of the essential oil of S. thymbra obtained from Wasita (WEO) and Safsaf (SEO) localities during two successive years

table-wrap-foot.p: Values are ±SEM (n = 3), means followed by different letters in same column denote significant difference at p < 0.05, paired -t-test. Lowercase letters compare means of WEO with SEO, uppercase letters compare means of sample with the standard antibiotic. Selectivity index was calculated as the ratio of the IC 50 values on V79 cells to those in the tested cancer cell lines. SI > 3 indicates a promising activity
W1 and W2 are plants collected from Wasita during fall 2017 and 2018, respectively. S1 and S2 are plants collected from Safsaf during fall 2017 and 2018, respectively
